description_for_human: Discover researchers, papers, datasets, and code repositories. Explore S-Index impact metrics across a federated network of researcher digital twins.
description_for_model: ResearchTwin is a federated platform for research discovery. Use the API to find researchers by slug, explore their publications (with citation counts from Semantic Scholar and Google Scholar), datasets (with FAIR-based QIC scores from Figshare), and code repositories (with QIC scores from GitHub). Compute S-Index impact metrics that combine Quality, Impact, and Collaboration across all research output types. Start with GET /api/researchers to list available researchers, or GET /api/discover?q=keyword to search across all researchers.
